content.prompt: In the context of the passage as a whole, the narrator is best described as a reader who

choices.label: fantasizes about escaping her boring day-to-day existence
feels superior to others who have not been exposed to literature
uses the stories she reads to help contextualize her own experience
struggles to understand the complicated plots in difficult texts

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe the narrator or speaker of a text.
